overview: One of the best Ukrainian shorts on the war in Donbas, this minimalistic film covers a single day during the siege at Donetsk airport where a group of medics wait under artillery bombardment for wounded fighters to arrive. This little-known short film was directed by Yegor Troyanovsky, who also directed the short film Tyl in 2015 and his debut feature Demon in 2022.
title: Aerodrome
